events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello! I understand you received the wrong item. I'm here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund?
Here is my order number 789456123 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund solution. Thank you very much for your help!
The refund process has been completed, and you should see the amount reflected on your statement shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
